description: RARE 2 level END UNIT,1737 sqft. townhome in Ladner's premier waterfront community, Westhampton. Freshly upgraded w/new flooring, this light-filled residence offers 3 spacious bedrms + versatile loft ideal as office, media or flex space. The open-concept main floor impresses w/9' ceilings, expansive windows, a central fireplace & chef-inspired quartz kitchen w/full-height cabinetry, integrated fridge, gas range, quartz island & premium appls. Upstairs features dramatic 8'-11' ceilings, a luxurious primary retreat w/walk-in closet & spa-style ensuite. Comfort ensured year-round w/heat/AC, private hedged yard & side-by-side double garage.Ownership incl. access to the Hampton Club w/pool,hot tub,fitness centre,sport court & guest suites.Steps to marina,golf,river trails & Nielsen Grove School
